topic.title: Hierarchical edge bundling
topic.shortdesc: Hierarchical edge bundling enables you to explore the relationships between classes and discover dependencies without having to navigate hierachies.

body.p: The elements of the library are visualized in a special diagram called a dendogram. Adjacent classes are grouped together, and the lines between classes show outgoing classes in green and incoming classes in red.

image.alt: Dendogram of the edgebundling tool showing the relationships between classes and the tension cortrol.
